info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 826 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Saunders Elevator, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
